resources.string: Stem for å laste den neste!
Finn det beste trekket for kvit.
Finn det beste trekket for svart.
For å få personleg tilpassa oppgåver:

Løys gradvis vanskelegare oppgåver og bygg ei sigerrekke. Det er inga tidsavgrensing, så det er berre å ta tida til hjelp. Spelet er over om du gjer eit feiltrekk. Men du kan hoppe over eit trekk for kvar omgang.
Hopp over dette trekket for å bevare sigerrekka di! Fungerer berre ein gong per omgang.

string.name: fromMyGames
string.comment:
fromMyGames
Puzzles generated from your games (all Lichess puzzles are made from games in the Lichess game database).

string.name: lookupOfPlayer
string.comment:
lookupOfPlayer
Puzzles generated from a specific player's games (all Lichess puzzles are made from games in the Lichess game database).

resources.string: Søk etter sjakknøtter frå partia til ein vald spelar

string.name: fromXGames
string.comment:
fromXGames
%s is a username. These puzzles were taken from that user's played games.

string.name: searchPuzzles
string.comment:
searchPuzzles
'Search' is a verb in this string.

string.name: fromMyGamesNone
string.comment:
fromMyGamesNone
All games on Lichess are generated from players' games. This feature lets you see if any puzzles have been generated from your games (and in this case, they haven't).

resources.string: Du har ingen sjakknøtter i databasen, men like fullt set Lichess umåtelig stor pris på deg. Spel parti i snøggsjakk og klassisk sjakk for å auke sjansen for å få med ei sjakknøtt!

string.name: fromXGamesFound
string.comment:
fromXGamesFound
Both variables are numbers (e.g. 2 puzzles found in 5000 games)
All games on Lichess are generated from players' games. In the example above, 2 puzzles were created from 5000 games a person played.
